alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 19 at 10:30AM AKDT until March 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM AKDT MONDAY FOR ADAK ISLAND... * WHAT...Westerly winds 50 to 60 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Adak Island. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 1 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The core of the strong winds will be north of the island, but channeled through westerly gaps will result in higher winds.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
